title: The Favorites - College Football Playoff + Army/Navy Betting Preview with JBoy & Stuckey | BONUS EPISODE
itunes:title: The Favorites - College Football Playoff + Army/Navy Betting Preview with JBoy & Stuckey | BONUS EPISODE
description:
College football's hallowed bowl season is nearly upon us! To cover the biggest games of the season Chad Millman and pro bettor Simon Hunter are joined by Stuckey and JBoy for a special bonus episode. Stuckey is a leading Action Network betting analyst, and JBoy is a college football expert and host of the Volume's popular podcast The JBoy Show.

First, the group touches on the standalone college football game on Saturday: the famous Army/Navy game. How should bettors approach this unique rivalry? Is the under always the best bet? And later, Stuckey and JBoy debate Alabama's chances to cover a big number vs Cincinnati, and whether Michigan has the horses to upset Georgia.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
